headline: Jefferies Backs Howmet (HWM) Acquisition, Sees EPS Lift into 2026
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) is included among the 20 Best Performing Dividend Stocks in 2025. On December 22, Jefferies analyst Sheila Kahyaoglu said Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) is acquiring Consolidated Aerospace Manufacturing from Stanley Black & Decker in an all-cash deal valued at $1.8 billion. Jefferies assumes the transaction closes around mid-Q2, with roughly half […]
